name: @lume/kiwi
description: High speed Cassowary constraint solver in JavaScript.

scripts.doc: rollup -c && jsdoc2md -f tmp/kiwi.js -m none -g none > docs/Kiwi.md && node scripts/docs-update-headings.js && prettier docs/Kiwi.md --write
scripts.version: npm run clean && npm run build && npm test && npm run bench && git add .
scripts.release:patch: npm version --no-workspaces patch -m 'v%s' && npm publish && git push --follow-tags
scripts.release:minor: npm version --no-workspaces minor -m 'v%s' && npm publish && git push --follow-tags
scripts.release:major: npm version --no-workspaces major -m 'v%s' && npm publish && git push --follow-tags
